```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(xml2)
library(rvest)
library(data.table)
```

## R Markdown

```{r}
link_01 <- "https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0944947/episodes?season=1"

seas_1 <- read_html(link_01) %>%
  html_nodes(xpath = "//*[(@id = \"episodes_content\")]") %>%
  html_children()


```

```{r}
movie <- read_html("https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Lego_Movie")
cast <- html_nodes(movie, "tr:nth-child(8) .plainlist a")
html_text(cast)
html_name(cast)
html_attrs(cast)
html_attr(cast, "href")


```
